data.actual_result: You have to scroll up by 20/30 messages to retrieve it
data.expected_result: you should still be jumped to the old message you picked at step 2
data.short_description: After jumping to message, the chat will scroll down itself a bit if you load messages in another channel and then come back
data.steps_to_repro: - Pick a channel - Jump to an old message - Switch to another channel with *unloaded* messages - Go back to the previous channel
